title: I'm trying to open chat with support but get "Chat support is currently not available."
content:
Trying to fix a pixel 2XL Device under warranty
got to:
Great news! Your Pixel 2 XL is under manufacturerâ€™s warranty, and the damage you reported is covered.
but opening chat gives "Chat support is not currently available"

I live in Israel and try to access the US google store in US business hours (there is no local support in Israel)
